fullText: Remember when you built things because it was fun to try and didn't think about the business of it at all? No moats, no pitching, no unit economics questions, no worrying about cohortized retention. Just built it to see if you could.

Me: Most of the atoms in the Earth were made by suns, but other suns, not ours.

13 yo: So you're saying our sun is really our stepsun?
